Package: com.github.tagc.semver.version

[Groovy] Class VersionFactory

    • com.github.tagc.semver.version.VersionFactory

    • A factory for producing base and decorated Version objects.

      Authors:
      davidfallah
      Since:
      v0.5.0

      • Methods Summary

          Returns an instance of BaseVersion constructed with the given parameters.

      • Method Detail

        • static BaseVersion makeBaseVersion(int major, int minor, int patch, boolean release)

          Returns an instance of BaseVersion constructed with the given parameters.

          Returns:
          an instance of BaseVersion
          Parameters:
          major - the major category value of the version instance
          minor - the minor category value of the version instance
          patch - the patch category value of the version instance
          release - the release setting of the version instance

        • static BaseVersion makeBaseVersion(java.util.Map m)

          Returns an instance of BaseVersion constructed with the given parameters.

          Returns:
          an instance of BaseVersion
          Parameters:
          m - a map of parameter names and their corresponding values corresponding to the construction parameters of BaseVersion.

        • static BaseVersion makeBaseVersion(java.util.List l)

          Returns an instance of BaseVersion constructed with the given parameters.

          Returns:
          an instance of BaseVersion
          Parameters:
          l - a list of parameter values corresponding to the construction parameters of BaseVersion.

        • static Builder makeBaseVersionBuilder()

          Returns a builder for BaseVersion to specify the construction parameters for the BaseVersion incrementally.

          Returns:
          an instance of BaseVersion.Builder

        • static SnapshotDecorator makeDecoratedSnapshotBumpedWithCategory(Version version, Category category)

          Returns a decorated version of version that is treated as a bumped, snapshot version of itself. The wrapped version can be directly accessed through Version#unwrap.

          Returns:
          a decorated instance of version
          Parameters:
          version - the Version to decorate
          category - the version category to bump by

        • static SnapshotDecorator makeDecoratedSnapshotBumpedWithMajor(Version version)

          Returns a decorated version of version that is treated as a major-bumped, snapshot version of itself. The wrapped version can be directly accessed through Version#unwrap.

          Returns:
          a decorated instance of version
          Parameters:
          version - the Version to decorate

        • static SnapshotDecorator makeDecoratedSnapshotBumpedWithMinor(Version version)

          Returns a decorated version of version that is treated as a minor-bumped, snapshot version of itself. The wrapped version can be directly accessed through Version#unwrap.

          Returns:
          a decorated instance of version
          Parameters:
          version - the Version to decorate

        • static SnapshotDecorator makeDecoratedSnapshotBumpedWithPatch(Version version)

          Returns a decorated version of version that is treated as a patch-bumped, snapshot version of itself. The wrapped version can be directly accessed through Version#unwrap.

          Returns:
          a decorated instance of version
          Parameters:
          version - the Version to decorate
